metadata.title: CVE-2024-1546 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When storing and re-accessing data on a networking channel, the length ofbuffers may have been confused, resulting in an out-of-bounds memory read.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 123, Firefox ESR < 115.8, andThunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
